<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intuitive Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=7200) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 53

**Prerequisites**
[Aeonbound](/Feats.aspx?ID=7195)

</column>

---

Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan. You are trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37). If you were already trained in Crafting, you instead gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5216) skill feat in a specialty of your choice; if you have both, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. In addition, when you critically fail to Repair an item, you get a failure instead.
name: Intuitive Crafting
